abstract: Another major shareholder advisory firm recommended stockholders reject billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s slate of nominees to Biogen Idec‘s board, reducing his odds of success.
lead_paragraph: Another major shareholder advisory firm recommended stockholders reject billionaire investor Carl C. Icahn’s slate of nominees to Biogen Idec‘s board, reducing his odds of success.

headline.main: A Third Proxy Firm Criticizes Icahn’s Biogen Slate
